feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (workpiece definition author : Fernand Veilleux) #<wp_width> = [#<_units_width> * #param_w] #<wp_length> = [#<_units_width> * #param_l] #<wp_depth> = [#<_units_width> * #param_d] #<wp_wall> = [#<_units_width> * #param_wt] #<wp_corner_radius> = [#<_units_width> * #param_cr] #<wp_inside_width> = [#<wp_width> - #<wp_wall> * 2] #<wp_inside_length> = [#<wp_length> - #<wp_wall> * 2]
#<wp_x> = #param_x #<wp_y> = #param_y
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_alx] [#param_x] [#param_x - #<wp_length> / 2] [#param_x - #<wp_length>] #<wp_left> = #31 #<wp_right> = [#<wp_left> + #<wp_length>]
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_aly] [#param_y - #<wp_width>] [#param_y - #<wp_width> / 2] [#param_y] #<wp_front> = #31 #<wp_rear> = [#<wp_front> + #<wp_width>]
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_alz] [#param_z] [#param_z + #<wp_depth>] #<surface> = #31
#<_z_clear> = [#<surface> + #param_zcl] #<_rapid_z> = [#<_z_clear> + #param_rap] #<bottom> = [#<surface> - #<wp_depth>] #<bottom_through> = [#<bottom> + #param_th]
/ o<#self_id_active> if [#param_sh] (show enabled) / o<stock> CALL [#<wp_left>] [#<wp_right>] [#<wp_front>] [#<wp_rear>] [#<surface>] [#<bottom>] [#param_cl] [#<wp_corner_radius>] [#<wp_wall>] / G0 X#param_x Y#param_y Z#<surface> / o<#self_id_active> endif (end #sub_name)
feature.name: Workpiece

feature.help: Change Tool and/or settings Changes setting accordingly even if disabled Message possible in terminal window
feature.name: Tool Change
feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (tool change params and changing code author : Fernand Veilleux) #<_drill_feed> = #param_v_feed #<_drill_retract> = #param_retract #<_drill_mode> = #param_dm #<_drill_dwell> = #param_dw #<_drill_q> = #param_dq #<_drill_rpm> = #param_speed #<_spindle_dir> = #param_spindle_dir #<_cooling_mode> = #param_cooling
#<_feed_normal> = #param_feed #<_rpm_normal> = #param_speed #<_feed_vertical> = #param_v_feed #<_lead_in_fact> = #param_in_fact #<_lead_out_fact> = #param_out_fact #<_penetration_mode> = #param_pen #<_depth_step> = #param_stp #<_ramp_down_ratio> = [#param_pr / 100] #<_tool_usage> = #param_us #<_stepover_min> = #param_so_m #<_stepover_normal> = [#param_so_n / 100] #<_thread_cut_depth> = #param_cut_depth #<_thread_cut_teeth> = #param_cut_teeth #<_thread_lead_in> = #param_lead_clearance
o<#self_id_usage> if [#<_tool_usage> EQ 3] o<select> CALL [31] [#param_drill] [#param_d_usr] [#param_d_fra] [#param_d_met] [#param_d_num] [#param_d_let] #<drill_diameter> = #31 o<#self_id_metric> if [[#<_metric> EQ 1] AND [#param_drill NE 0]] #<drill_diameter> = [#<drill_diameter> * 25.4] o<#self_id_metric> endif #<drill_point_len> = [[#<drill_diameter> / 2] / TAN[#param_tip / 2]] (print,Drill info : diameter = #<drill_diameter>, point angle = #param_tip°, point length = #<drill_point_len>) o<#self_id_usage> endif
o<#self_id_act> if [#param_act AND [#param_dnum NE #5400]] M9 T#param_dnum M6 o<#self_id_act> endif
o<#self_id_lc> if [#param_tlc GE 1] G43 H#param_dnum o<#self_id_lc> endif
o<#self_id_01> if [#<_spindle_dir> GT 0] o<#self_id_02> if [#param_us EQ 3] o<set_spindle_rpm> CALL [#<_drill_rpm>] F#<_drill_feed> o<#self_id_02> else o<set_feed_rate_and_speed> CALL [1] o<#self_id_02> endif o<#self_id_01> endif (end #sub_name)

param.tool_tip: Params will be set even if disabled
param.name: Active

param.tool_tip: Use G43 and probe if setup
param.name: Use length comp

param.tool_tip: Set these when usage is drilling
param.name: Drilling

param.name: Select drill size
Point angle
param.options: 118° Medium hard material=118:135° Hard material=135:90° Plastic=90:60° Plastic=60:Flat end=180

param.tool_tip:
G73 requires Q>0 and R
G81 requires R
G82 requires R and P
G83 requires Q>0 and R
param.name: Mode
param.options: With Chip Breaking - G73=73:Standard - G81=81:Dwell at bottom - G82=82:Peck Drilling Cycle - G83=83

param.tool_tip: Distance from face in machine units before engaging cutter
param.name: Lead-in clearance

param.tool_tip: Depth of cutter engagment in machine units per pass
param.name: Cutter engagement

feature.before:
(begin #sub_name) (regular group authors : Nick Drobchenko and Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act]
(begin #sub_name items)
feature.name: Group

feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (drill a single hole author : Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act AND [#<_tool_usage> EQ 3]] (if enabled) o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#<surface> + #<center_drill_depth>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<drill_single> CALL [#param_x] [#param_y] [#31] [#32] [#<drill_diameter>] [#<drill_point_len>] [#param_fcut] [#param_auto] o<#self_id_active> endif
feature.name: Drill Single

param.name: Drill down to
param.options: User defined=0:Through=1:Center drill depth=2:Bottom=3:Half=4:One quarter=5:Three quarter=6

feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (drill a single hole author : Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act AND [#<_tool_usage> EQ 3]] (if enabled) o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#<surface> + #<center_drill_depth>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<drill_single> CALL [#param_x] [#param_y] [#31] [#32] [#<drill_diameter>] [#<drill_point_len>] [#param_fcut] [#param_auto] o<#self_id_active> endif
feature.name: Drill Single

param.name: Drill down to
param.options: User defined=0:Through=1:Center drill depth=2:Bottom=3:Half=4:One quarter=5:Three quarter=6

feature.name: Drill Array
feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (drill #param_xc by #param_yc holes author : Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act AND [#<_tool_usage> EQ 3]] (if enabled) o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#31 + #<center_drill_depth>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<#self_id_01> if [#param_xc EQ 1] #33 = 0 o<#self_id_01> else o<select> CALL [33] [#param_dxdef] [#param_dx] [#param_dx / [#param_xc - 1]] o<#self_id_01> endif #<dx#ID> = #33 o<select> CALL [33] [#param_al_x] [0] [- [#param_xc - 1] * #<dx#ID> / 2] [- [#param_xc - 1] * #<dx#ID>] #<first_x#ID> = #33
o<#self_id_02> if [#param_yc EQ 1] #33 = 0 o<#self_id_02> else o<select> CALL [33] [#param_dydef] [#param_dy] [#param_dy / [#param_yc - 1]] o<#self_id_02> endif #<dy#ID> = #33 o<select> CALL [33] [#param_al_y] [- #<dy#ID> * [#param_yc - 1]] [- #<dy#ID> * [#param_yc - 1] / 2] [0] #<first_y#ID> = #33
(get and save current coords system offsets) #<old_coord_system#ID> = [#<_coord_system> / 10] o<get_offsets> CALL #<offset_x#ID> = #<_offsets_x> #<offset_y#ID> = #<_offsets_y> #<offset_z#ID> = #<_offsets_z> #<offset_r#ID> = #<_offsets_r> (change coords system) G#<_off_rot_coord_system>
#<start_y#ID> = [#<offset_y#ID> + #<first_y#ID>] o<#self_id_loop_Y> repeat [#param_yc] #<start_x#ID> = [#<offset_x#ID> + #<first_x#ID>] o<#self_id_loop_X> repeat [#param_xc] (get rotated coordinates then apply to new coords) o<rotate_xy> CALL [#<start_x#ID> + #param_x] [#<start_y#ID> + #param_y] [#<offset_x#ID> + #param_x] [#<offset_y#ID> + #param_y] [#<offset_r#ID> + #param_rot] G10 L2 P#5220 X[#<_rotated_x>] Y[#<_rotated_y>] Z#<offset_z#ID> R[#<offset_r#ID> + #param_rot]
o<drill_single> CALL [0] [0] [#31] [#32] [#<drill_diameter>] [#<drill_point_len>] [#param_fcut] [#param_auto]
#<start_x#ID> = [#<start_x#ID> + #<dx#ID>] o<#self_id_loop_X> endrepeat
#<start_y#ID> = [#<start_y#ID> + #<dy#ID>] o<#self_id_loop_Y> endrepeat
(restore coordinate system) G#<old_coord_system#ID> G10 L2 P#5220 X#<offset_x#ID> Y#<offset_y#ID> Z#<offset_z#ID> R#<offset_r#ID>
o<#self_id_active> endif (end #sub_name)

param.name: Drill down to
param.options: User defined=0:Through=1:Center drill depth=2:Bottom=3:Half=4:One quarter=5:Three quarter=6

feature.help: Change Tool and/or settings Changes setting accordingly even if disabled Message possible in terminal window
feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (tool change params and changing code author : Fernand Veilleux) #<_drill_feed> = #param_v_feed #<_drill_retract> = #param_retract #<_drill_mode> = #param_dm #<_drill_dwell> = #param_dw #<_drill_q> = #param_dq #<_drill_rpm> = #param_speed #<_spindle_dir> = #param_spindle_dir #<_cooling_mode> = #param_cooling
#<_feed_normal> = #param_feed #<_rpm_normal> = #param_speed #<_feed_vertical> = #param_v_feed #<_penetration_mode> = #param_pen #<_depth_step> = #param_stp #<_ramp_down_ratio> = [#param_pr / 100] #<_tool_usage> = #param_us #<_stepover_min> = #param_so_m #<_stepover_normal> = [#param_so_n / 100] #<_thread_cut_depth> = #param_cut_depth #<_thread_cut_teeth> = #param_cut_teeth #<_thread_lead_in> = #param_lead_clearance
o<#self_id_usage> if [#<_tool_usage> EQ 3] o<select> CALL [31] [#param_drill] [#param_d_usr] [#param_d_fra] [#param_d_met] [#param_d_num] [#param_d_let] #<drill_diameter> = #31 o<#self_id_metric> if [[#<_metric> EQ 1] AND [#param_drill NE 0]] #<drill_diameter> = [#<drill_diameter> * 25.4] o<#self_id_metric> endif
#<drill_point_len> = [[#<drill_diameter> / 2] / TAN[#param_tip / 2]] (print,Drill info : diameter = #<drill_diameter>, point angle = #param_tip°, point length = #<drill_point_len>) o<#self_id_usage> endif
o<#self_id_act> if [#param_act AND [#param_dnum NE #5400]] M9 T#param_dnum M6 o<#self_id_act> endif
o<#self_id_lc> if [#param_tlc GE 1] G43 H#param_dnum o<#self_id_lc> endif
o<#self_id_01> if [#<_spindle_dir> GT 0] o<#self_id_02> if [#param_us EQ 3] o<set_spindle_rpm> CALL [#<_drill_rpm>] F#<_drill_feed> o<#self_id_02> else o<set_feed_rate_and_speed> CALL [1] o<#self_id_02> endif o<#self_id_01> endif (end #sub_name)

feature.name: Slot/oval 1 point
feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (slot from center or end author: Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act] (if enabled) #<l#ID> = [#param_l * #<_units_width>] #<w#ID> = [#param_w * #<_units_width>] #<fcs#ID> = [#param_fcs * #<_units_width>]
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<select> CALL [33] [#param_ref] [#<l#ID> / 2] [0]
o<rectangle> CALL [#param_x] [#param_y] [#<l#ID> + #<w#ID>] [#<w#ID>] [#param_rot] [#33] [0] [1] [#<w#ID> / 2] [#param_opt] [#param_dir] [#31] [#32] [#param_pv] [#param_fp] [#<fcs#ID>] o<#self_id_active> endif (end #sub_name)

(begin #sub_name) (slot from center or end author: Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act] (if enabled) #<l#ID> = [#param_l * #<_units_width>] #<w#ID> = [#param_w * #<_units_width>] #<fcs#ID> = [#param_fcs * #<_units_width>]
o<select> CALL [31] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<select> CALL [33] [#param_ref] [#<l#ID> / 2] [0]
o<rectangle> CALL [#param_x] [#param_y] [#<l#ID> + #<w#ID>] [#<w#ID>] [#param_rot] [#33] [0] [1] [#<w#ID> / 2] [#param_opt] [#param_dir] [#31] [#32] [#param_pv] [#param_fp] [#<fcs#ID>] o<#self_id_active> endif (end #sub_name)

feature.help: Change Tool and/or settings Changes setting accordingly even if disabled Message possible in terminal window
feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (tool change params and changing code author : Fernand Veilleux) #<_drill_feed> = #param_v_feed #<_drill_retract> = #param_retract #<_drill_mode> = #param_dm #<_drill_dwell> = #param_dw #<_drill_q> = #param_dq #<_drill_rpm> = #param_speed #<_spindle_dir> = #param_spindle_dir #<_cooling_mode> = #param_cooling
#<_feed_normal> = #param_feed #<_rpm_normal> = #param_speed #<_feed_vertical> = #param_v_feed #<_penetration_mode> = #param_pen #<_depth_step> = #param_stp #<_ramp_down_ratio> = [#param_pr / 100] #<_tool_usage> = #param_us #<_stepover_min> = #param_so_m #<_stepover_normal> = [#param_so_n / 100] #<_thread_cut_depth> = #param_cut_depth #<_thread_cut_teeth> = #param_cut_teeth #<_thread_lead_in> = #param_lead_clearance
o<#self_id_usage> if [#<_tool_usage> EQ 3] o<select> CALL [31] [#param_drill] [#param_d_usr] [#param_d_fra] [#param_d_met] [#param_d_num] [#param_d_let] #<drill_diameter> = #31 o<#self_id_metric> if [[#<_metric> EQ 1] AND [#param_drill NE 0]] #<drill_diameter> = [#<drill_diameter> * 25.4] o<#self_id_metric> endif
#<drill_point_len> = [[#<drill_diameter> / 2] / TAN[#param_tip / 2]] (print,Drill info : diameter = #<drill_diameter>, point angle = #param_tip°, point length = #<drill_point_len>) o<#self_id_usage> endif
o<#self_id_act> if [#param_act AND [#param_dnum NE #5400]] M9 T#param_dnum M6 o<#self_id_act> endif
o<#self_id_lc> if [#param_tlc GE 1] G43 H#param_dnum o<#self_id_lc> endif
o<#self_id_01> if [#<_spindle_dir> GT 0] o<#self_id_02> if [#param_us EQ 3] o<set_spindle_rpm> CALL [#<_drill_rpm>] F#<_drill_feed> o<#self_id_02> else o<set_feed_rate_and_speed> CALL [1] o<#self_id_02> endif o<#self_id_01> endif (end #sub_name)

feature.help: Create a Rectangle and align X and Y Corners can be radiused or beveled
feature.name: Rectangle
feature.call:
(begin #sub_name) (rectangle author : Fernand Veilleux) o<#self_id_active> if [#param_act] o<#self_id_00> if [#param_h GT #param_w] (if narrower than high) #<h#ID> = [#param_w * #<_units_width>] #<w#ID> = [#param_h * #<_units_width>] #<rot#ID> = [90.0 + #param_rot] o<select> CALL [31] [#param_al_x] [-#<h#ID> / 2] [0] [#<h#ID> / 2] o<select> CALL [32] [#param_al_y] [-#<w#ID> / 2] [0] [#<w#ID> / 2]
o<#self_id_00> else #<w#ID> = [#param_w * #<_units_width>] #<h#ID> = [#param_h * #<_units_width>] #<rot#ID> = #param_rot o<select> CALL [32] [#param_al_x] [#<w#ID> / 2] [0] [-#<w#ID> / 2] o<select> CALL [31] [#param_al_y] [-#<h#ID> / 2] [0] [#<h#ID> / 2] o<#self_id_00> endif
#<fcs#ID> = [#param_fcs * #<_units_width>] o<get_min> CALL [37] [2] [#param_cr * #<_units_width>] [#<h#ID> / 2]
o<select> CALL [33] [#param_s] [#param_u_s] [#<surface>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4] o<select> CALL [34] [#param_dpt] [#param_u_dpt] [#<bottom_through>] [#<bottom>] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 2] [#<surface> - #<wp_depth> / 4] [#<bottom> + #<wp_depth> / 4]
o<rectangle> CALL [#param_x] [#param_y] [#<w#ID>] [#<h#ID>] [#<rot#ID>] [#32] [#31] [#param_ct] [#37] [#param_opt] [#param_dir] [#33] [#34] [#param_pv] [#param_fp] [#<fcs#ID>] o<#self_id_active> endif (end #sub_name)

param.tool_tip: Radius for rounded or distance from apex
param.name: Radius
